title: Seven days before you die [Widescreen]
creator_credit: Nassiem Valamanesh, Andrei Gostin and MAPS
brief_description: A man recounts the 7 days leading up to his death when he is shadowed by a mysterious stranger in black. On day 6 he receives a strange package which instantly triggers a physical response, as well as strange visions which may or may not be related to the stranger. Cast includes Michael Kumnick, Roderick Ho’vell and a computer generated voice.
